ðŸ“– Summary: ggwave is a tiny data-over-sound library enabling communication between devices using audio. It employs FSK modulation and error correction, and supports various platforms through a flexible audio backend. The library facilitates applications such as serverless broadcasting, IoT communication, audio QR codes, and device pairing.
